title: Quality Improvement (QI) and Health Equity Integrated Education for Strengthening Physician Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Healthcare System Operations and Leadership Experience, with Basic Statistical Analysis Skills
context.additional_context: Competency-based education for healthcare administrators and decision-makers, designed around multidisciplinary team collaboration and practical projects

learning_goals: Achieve practical competency in systematically integrating the concept of health equity into QI projects.
Design and implement a data-driven decision-making process for improving healthcare systems.
Acquire the ability to perform the full cycle (planning-execution-evaluation) of QI projects under multidisciplinary team leadership.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
